title: Outsourcing
descr: There is no need to hire a specialist - our team will take care of all your IT tasks.

title: Outstaffing
descr: Our team will work exclusively on your project, you will be able to manage specialists, and our company will solve all problems.

title: Turnkey project
descr: Get a guaranteed result in the stipulated time, with a pre-calculated cost, with minimal risks and maximum management by the Customer.

title: Time & materials
descr: Ensuring a high-quality result in the specified time, with transparent pricing and the possibility of managing the scope of work.
